attributes.action: force BT to consult all households and businesses on new installations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The telecommunications act 1984 gives BT a statutory right to install equipment such as poles and cabling without consultation. This means that they can install equipment on the roadside outside your house without consulting you. This petition is to request that BT are forced by law to consult on all new installations and incorparate the views of those affected.
